title: Did Marjorie Taylor Greene Refer to Guam as a Foreign Country?
subtitle: The Republican Congresswoman from Georgia was met with bemusement after remarks she made on the fringes of CPAC 2021.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In February 2021, U.S. Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene referred to Guam, a U.S. territory, as a foreign country.
